content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Welcome, Max. I am pleased to show you my property. Let's start the negotiation. What is your first offer for the rental price? Remember, I am looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 500 euros per month. This is a fair price for an unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, Max, but 500 euros per month is too low for my apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Remember, the apartment is newly built, unfurnished, has a size of 50 square meters, and is a one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is also close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the condition of the apartment and its prime location, I am willing to increase my offer to 550 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 550 euros per month is still too low for my apartment. Remember, the apartment is newly built, unfurnished, has a size of 50 square meters, and is a one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is also close to all important facilities. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. Given the competitive rental market, I am willing to increase my offer to 600 euros per month.
